title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Mobile Education Application for Peripheral Artery Disease Patient Nursing Follow-Up

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Nursing Theory and Practical Experience, Along with Basic Chronic Disease Management Knowledge
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: The nursing follow-up process for peripheral artery disease patients can be mapped to a mobile application interface
Core nursing functions—such as symptom monitoring by disease, medication side effect management, and wound healing tracking—can be designed as digital content
Patient-nurse interaction scenarios can be transformed into structured educational modules by applying contextual instructional design models
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
